amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of the Executive Order titled "Strengthening Buy-American Preferences for Infrastructure Projects.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 206 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of the Executive Order titled "Strengthening Buy-American Preferences for Infrastructure Projects.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A073) Agreed to by recorded vote: 373 - 51 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A073) Agreed to by recorded vote: 373 - 51 (Roll no. 396).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Bost.
